body_html:
For those who are compelled to use cuda 9.2, and thus pytorch 0.4.1 you can actually install pytorch 0.4.0 to read your former models with this command

pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu91/torch-0.4.0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl

Fortunately, it does work with cuda 9.2
body_text:
For those who are compelled to use cuda 9.2, and thus pytorch 0.4.1 you can actually install pytorch 0.4.0 to read your former models with this command
pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu91/torch-0.4.0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl
Fortunately, it does work with cuda 9.2
body:
For those who are compelled to use cuda 9.2, and thus pytorch 0.4.1 you can actually install pytorch 0.4.0 to read your former models with this command 

`pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu91/torch-0.4.0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl`


Fortunately, it does work with cuda 9.2
